INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: With strong doses (100 mg per day of chlorpromazine): elevation of glycemia (decrease of the freeing of insulin)
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Inform the patient and reinforce self monitoring of blood glucose. Possible adjustment of the dosage of the insulin durin the treatment with the neuroleptic and after it is stopped.
